profession: Quality Assurance Engineer for Software Development
introductions: Over 13 years experience in the field of Quality Assurance. High level of attention to detail, adaptable, and with experience in Manual and Automation test approaches. Experienced with both Scrum and Agile methodologies and processes across multiple software development areas, including Mobile, Connected devices and Gaming Applications.

complimentarySkills: Advocate and strong supporter of Agile processes and mentality.
Drives for technical excellence & quality-first focus.
Advisor and guide for better Gherkin scenario writing and BDD implimentation.
Bridges the natural language gap between business and engineer.
Efficient learning ability for new tools, processes and frameworks.
Ability to manipulate data, automation, proxy tool and debugging code for a wide range of testing coverage.
me: Driver for Quality over Quantity, who aims to change the way teams think about general quality and testing approaches.

Interested in joining a improvement driven team, where I can extend my knowledge and hands on experience implementing and maintaining automation suites, or train to be a Test Manager or Quality Consultant.
meReadMore: I have a broad understanding of both good and bad testing and development processes, and aim to always use previous experience to guide and constantly approve team approaches to software development.
I am able to work on my own, but I prefer working directly with developers, product, design, and all other elements in cross-fuctional teams.
I am approachable and easy to get on with; providing both a friendly ear and a sound board for ideas.
I see myself as artistic and creative, dabbling in oil painting and wire weaving crafts.
I can be quite stubborn about driving the mentality that Quality should be everyone's responsibily and passion, not just something left to the QA.
My communication skills are of a high standard; willing and able to converse with all levels and experiences.

about: Part of a team responsible for creating and maintaining Discovery's Connected/Smart TV devices software application, which allows users to watch various Discovery Channel content.
aboutReadMore: Heavily manual role, conducting end-to-end testing across multiple pieces of hardware.

about: Part of various teams responsible for creating and maintaining some of the front-end, data-driven pages. Displaying useful streaming and media consumption statistics, as well as monetary earnings and spendature values.
aboutReadMore: Sole tester for cross-functional teams, covering and implementing evolving test processes; driving quality-first approaches.
Advisor for fellow QA Engineers, coaching and improving the more junior members confidence with BDD and quality driven development in their own respective teams.

additionalSkillList.title: Responsibilities included:
skills: Helped implement and maintain Acceptance/Functional automation test suites, covering both Frontend and Backend functionality, in Javascript and PHP.
Helped mentor fellow Engineers in the creation of BDD Scenarios using Gherkin syntax.
Studied and helped implement a Mutation Testing tool into a Web product, to automate monitoring of Code Coverage levels.
Helped create/update DOR/DOD documentation (Definition of Ready/Definition of Done).
One of the leading spokespeople for implementing a QA Engineer earlier in the development process.
One of the leading coordinators for evolving Jira, Development & Delivery processes.
Mentor and guide on matters of general testing best practices, and troubleshooting for fellow QA Engineers.
Presented and helped organise presentations and documentation on the following topics:
○ BDD best practices.
○ Double Diamond development process.
○ Mutation testing.
○ Testing best practices.
○ How to test Automation Scenarios and both Frontend and Backend functionality.

about: Solo quality representative for a small startup company, which hosted various football websites.
aboutReadMore: The company's first QA member. Hired to help mentor and guide the close-knit team approach to more quality driven development, and improve their test coverage.

additionalSkillList.title: Responsibilities included:
skills: Created documentation and provided guidance on Jira tickets creation.
Mentored the team on BDD best practices.
Learned how to use Ghost Inspector to create Automated Regression suites for purely Frontend testing.
Investigated running Ghost Inspector test suites on deployment using Octopus Deploy build service.
Some experience with connecting Runscope API testing tool to a Ghost Inspector test suite.
Some experience using Sitecore and Umbrago content management systems.

about: Lead a small cross-region Testing Team (US, UK, Lithuania), covering testing for a Webinar service website.
aboutReadMore: Looking after the QA team, organising, monitoring and providing end-to-end, regression testing and driving the implementation of automation testing.

additionalSkillList.title: Responsibilities included:
skills: Wrote test documentation and test plans.
Some experience with using SoapUI API tool to create and run tests for microservices.
Some experience writing automated test cases in Java using Selenium Webdriver and IntelliJ.
Cross browser and Mobile testing.
Experienced with Agile, Kanban and Waterfall project cycles.
Worked directly with Developers and Product Managers.
Experienced with QTest test management tool.
Mentoring fellow QA.
Able to monitor Network and Console Logs.

about: Part of a versatile testing unit for a Mobile Application Agency, covering a range of different mobile platforms and application modals.
aboutReadMore: Senior tester, responsible for leading test efforts and representative for outsourced projects. Helped drive change and testing culture within the business.

additionalSkillList.title: Responsibilities included:
skills: Wrote and improved test documentation and test plans.
Experienced with the use of Charlesproxy to monitor and manipulate API calls between the app and server.
Experienced with the use of XCode and ADT Eclipse to obtain crash logs for both Android and iPhone devices.
Experienced with Window 8 devices and applications.
Experienced with Agile, Scrum and Waterfall project cycles.
Worked directly with Developers and Designers through project cycles.
Work on various Financial Services, in-built software, Shopping, and Sports applications.
Experienced with Jira and TestRail test management tool.
Mentoring other members of QA and the Development Team in the use of the various tools required for projects.
Some experience with Automation Testing using EggPlant and Selenium IDE frameworks.

otherTitles: Acting Project Manager, Senior QA, QA
about: Covered various roles within the testing/quality department for a well established and long running games company.
aboutReadMore: Evolved from simply testing games to organising testing responsibilites and daily coverage. Also monitoring and organising test management data between shifts and different business units. Then moved into hardware and software management, being involved with the software submissions and submission monitoring.

additionalSkillList.title: Responsibilities included:
skills: Created test documentation.
Experienced with Planning and Project Scheduling.
Keeping a constant line of communication open with Leads and Line Managers.
Lead a small team working on Flash and Emulated titles on Sega’s online gaming website.
Learned API error debugging.
Tested a variety of games on the various different platforms around and popular at the time.
Sending and receiving code from Producers.
Created image files from raw product code.
Responsible for submitting Game Code to distributors for final evaluation and manufacturing approval.
Experienced with the maintenance of various consoles and their respective virtual console suites.
